title: Cess not deduction, companies should accept gracefully, says Finance Minister Sitharaman - Economic Times
content:
1. Cess not deduction, companies should accept gracefully, says Finance Minister Sitharaman  Economic Times
  2. Personal Finance: Seven takeaways for taxpayers from the Union Budget 2022  Free Press Journal
  3. Union Budget 2022: 'Didn't increase tax burden on people,' says finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman; explains why  Hindustan Times
  4. From crypto tax to updated I-T returns, here are personal finance highlights from Budget 2022  CNBCTV18
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: "Some courts are coming up with a verdict which is contrary to the intent of the legislature. We needed to come out with an explanatory amendment...There are times when you have to be retrospective just so that we are being fair. It is not to go with any other intent," Sitharaman said at a post-budget interaction organised by industry body Ficci.
